name: Sigit Triwibowo
description: I am a student in Electronics Engineering Technology at Politeknik Negeri Semarang, with a strong interest and experience in developing electronic systems, automation, and IoT-based technology integration. I possess a solid understanding of control systems, digital and analog circuits, and microcontroller programming, including platforms such as Arduino and ESP32. Accustomed to working both independently and in teams, I am capable of identifying and solving technical problems efficiently. I am continuously improving my skills in industrial automation, embedded systems, and applied artificial intelligence, and I am open to new challenges that allow me to contribute meaningfully to both organizations and society.
